Package ohos.media.camera.device

Interface CameraInfo


  • public interface CameraInfo
    Gets logical camera information, such as the facing type of the camera, connected physical cameras, and link type.
    Since:
    1
    SystemCapability
    SystemCapability.Multimedia#CAMERA

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Interface Description
      static interface  CameraInfo.DeviceLinkType
      Describes the link type of a physical camera.
      static interface  CameraInfo.FacingType
      Describes the facing type of the camera.

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods

      Gets a physical camera link type.
      int getFacingType​()
      Gets the facing type of the camera.
      String getLogicalId​()
      Gets the logical camera ID.
      List<String> getPhysicalIdList​()
      Gets IDs of physical cameras belong to the logical camera.

      Obtains the hash code of this CameraInfo object.

    • Method Detail

      • getLogicalId

        Gets the logical camera ID.
        Returns:
        Returns the logical camera ID.
        Since:

      • getFacingType

        int getFacingType​()
        Gets the facing type of the camera.

        All physical cameras belong to the logical camera has the same facing type.

        Returns:
        Returns the facing type.
        Since:
        1
        See Also:
        CameraInfo.FacingType

      • getPhysicalIdList

        List<String> getPhysicalIdList​()
        Gets IDs of physical cameras belong to the logical camera.
        Returns:
        Returns physical camera IDs.
        Since:
        1

      • getDeviceLinkType

        int getDeviceLinkType​(String physicalId)
        Gets a physical camera link type.
        Parameters:
        physicalId - Indicates the ID of a physical camera.
        Returns:
        Returns the link type of the physical camera.
        Since:
        1
        See Also:
        CameraInfo.DeviceLinkType

      • equals

        boolean equals​(Object obj)
        Checks whether this CameraInfo object equals a specified object.

        The two objects are equal only when all their elements are the same, including the FacingType and LogicalId.

        Overrides:
        equals in class Object
        Parameters:
        obj - Indicates the specified object to compare.
        Returns:
        Returns true if the two objects are equal; returns false otherwise.
        Since:
        5
        See Also:
        Object.hashCode(), HashMap

      • toString

        String toString​()
        Returns a string representation of this CameraInfo object. The string format is as follows: "CameraInfo{cameraId='%s', facingType=%d, physicalIds=[%s, ...%s], availabilities=[%d,...%d], linkTypes=[%d,...%d]}".
        Overrides:
